CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): B.4.k.14a, drugenddateformat (3N) --> Value should be 102 AND B.4.k.14b, drugenddate (8N) --> convert to CCYYMMDD
E2B (R3): G.k.4.r.5 Date and Time of Last Administration Conformance: Optional Data Type: Date / Time OID: None Value Allowed: nullFlavor: MSK, ASKU, NASK
CustomField.inlineHelpText: For ongoing drug administration after the onset of the reaction or event, this item should be blank and Actions taken with drug should be used.
CustomField.label: Date of Last Administration
